ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures that we have a completed fact find back from the customer prior to moving the review past the fact find stage. Else, we must have skipped the fact find.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && (ISPICKVAL(OW_status__c, "Provide advice") || ISPICKVAL(OW_status__c, "Complete")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( OW_review_fact_find_status__c, "Skipped" ) || ISPICKVAL( OW_review_fact_find_status__c, "Incomplete" ) || ISPICKVAL( OW_review_fact_find_status__c, "Complete" ))
